body:
Comment 2: 
wreck.mtv=; cat >x.go
package main

var x = []int{1
}
wreck.mtv=; gofmt x.go
x.go:3:16: expected '}', found ';'
x.go:4:1: expected declaration, found '}'
wreck.mtv=; 6g x.go
x.go:3: syntax error: unexpected semicolon or newline, expecting }
wreck.mtv=; 

gofmt should say semicolon or newline, in some form,
to make it clear that it could have been a newline
in the source file that triggered the error.
_Owner changed to **g...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
